page.title: 05INWOOD, BATCH AND CWM DALE
page.content: { Inwood}is a small valley. It is set in the{Long Mynd}hill, north of Church Stretton. It is a nice quiet little valley with a stream and road going through. It is good in winter because you can go down the hills on your sledge. It is a very brackeny place. { Batch}valley is a peaceful place in the middle of All Stretton village. It has four houses and one holiday house. You can't drive very far but there is a small car park. A stream flows through Batch valley. {Cwm Dale,}another small valley surrounded by hills has only a private road. There are a few houses one of which used to be a shepherd's hut. Pony trekking is popular in Cwm Dale. They are all attractive unspoilt valleys with plenty of wildlife but sometimes there can be lots of tourists.
